snippet: The city of Bonn was once known for diplomacy, but is now dealing with social tensions between Muslim newcomers and a far-right nationalist group.
abstract: Bonn Journal; German city of Bonn has become the site of growing social tensions between Muslim immigrants and a far-right nationalist group that is mounting a campaign against them.
lead_paragraph: The city of Bonn was once known for diplomacy, but is now dealing with social tensions between Muslim newcomers and a far-right nationalist group.

headline.seo: Hostility Between Muslims and Nationalists Rattles Bonn, Germany
headline.main: Hostility Between Muslims and German Nationalists Rattles a Former Capital
headline.print_headline: Hostility Between Muslims and German Nationalists Rattles a Former Capital
